think_procedure: First, I read the description of the knob. The knob 'jit_inline_above_cost' sets the query cost above which JIT compilation attempts to inline functions and operators. It is mentioned that setting this to -1 disables inlining. This indicates that the knob has a special value that changes its function, which is a characteristic of a 'special' knob. Therefore, this knob can be classified as a 'special' knob.
